alert.note: Alert for Cook; Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:54AM CDT until April 05 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lake County in northeastern Illinois... Northern Cook County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 730 AM CDT. * At 654 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Dundee, or near Elgin, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chicago, Elgin, Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Glenview, Buffalo Grove, Bartlett, Streamwood, Hanover Park, Wheeling, Park Ridge, Northbrook and Elk Grove Village. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 57 and 77. I-94 between mile markers 8 and 40. I-290 between mile markers 1 and 4. I-294 between mile markers 8 and 40. This includes... Oakton Community College, Schaumburg Boomers Baseball, College of Lake County, Great Lakes Naval Training Center, Harper College, Lake County IL Fairgrounds, Lake Forest College, Northwestern University, Ravinia Music Festival, and Six Flags Great America. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
